metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7751 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The svg_probe function in libavformat/img2dec.c in FFmpeg through 3.4.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (Infinite Loop) via a crafted XML file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7751` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec-extra60 - 7:4.0-1
libavcodec60 - 7:4.0-1
libavdevice60 - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter-extra9 - 7:4.0-1
libavfilter9 - 7:4.0-1
libavformat-extra - 7:4.0-1
libavformat-extra60 - 7:4.0-1
libavformat60 - 7:4.0-1
libavutil58 - 7:4.0-1
libpostproc57 - 7:4.0-1
libswresample4 - 7:4.0-1
libswscale7 - 7:4.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.0-1').
gst-libav1.0 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
mythtv package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
